sentences.english: Depression can not eat anything in the context of the contraband liquor is the most stringent.
sentences.chinese: 在抑郁症不能吃什么的范围内，酒类是最严格的禁品。

sentences.english: A person used to transport drugs or contraband from one place to another.
sentences.chinese: 被用来从一地到另一地运送毒品或违禁品的人。

sentences.english: Is there any contraband in your luggage?
sentences.chinese: 你行李里有什么违禁品吗？

sentences.english: Do you carry any fire-arms or narcotics?
sentences.chinese: 你有携带军火或违禁品吗？

sentences.english: We forgot that cameras are a no-no in hot springs.
sentences.chinese: 我们忘了相机在温泉里算是违禁品。

sentences.english: Also, PA equipment were added as well, alerting the passengers not taking contraband.
sentences.chinese: 安检等待区还增配了，反复通知旅客不许携带违禁品。

sentences.english: Legalization reduces or eliminates all of these burdens.
sentences.chinese: 而对违禁品的合法化能减轻甚至消除这些负担。

sentences.english: Drugs and weapons aren't the only contraband in prisons these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今，监狱中的违禁品不再局限于毒品和武器。

sentences.english: If this becomes more widely known, will they make chocolate illegal?
sentences.chinese: 如果知道的人多了，巧克力会不会被归为违禁品？

sentences.english: Each sorting station has a scanner which scans each parcel for prohibited things.
sentences.chinese: 每个储存站点都有扫描器可以扫描违禁品。

sentences.english: Yes, my clothes and some other personal belongings. Do contrabands.
sentences.chinese: 可以，里面装有衣服以及一些个人物品，没有违禁品。

sentences.english: Contrabands and possessions of the criminal that were used in the crime shall be confiscated.
sentences.chinese: 违禁品和供犯罪所用的本人财物，应当予以没收。

sentences.english: Red starts pulling out contraband, giving them their commissions.
sentences.chinese: 瑞德开始取出偷带的违禁品，并付给他们相应的酬劳。

sentences.english: If you bring contraband into a country，you may go to jail.
sentences.chinese: 如果你把违禁品带进一个国家，可能要坐牢。
